@wicked_destiny wrote:

hello i’ve got aquestion well a problem actualy
when i fill the vials up with water it goes to 28 even when i onlygot 1 vial…
i want it so when i have 8 vials it fills up 8 and when i have
28 it fills up all 28

how can i fix that

regards

wicked destiny

public void vialfill(int XP,int item){ deleteItem(229,getItemSlot(229), 1); addItem(item, 1); addSkillXP(XP, 12); setAnimation(2259); sendMessage("You make a "+getItemName(item)+"."); }

[CODE]else if (useItemID == 229 && atObjectID == 879)// vials water
if(playerLevel[12] >= 0){
for(int o28 = 0; o28 < 28; o28++){
if(playerHasItemAmount(229, 1)){
vialfill(52,227);
} else {
o28 = 29;
sendMessage("");
RemoveAllWindows();
}
}
} else {
sendMessage("");

}[/CODE][/
